short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever wondered how much you spend on Amazon.com? This chrome extension allows you to calculate how much you spent on Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever wondered how much you spend on Amazon? This chrome extension allows you to calculate the total amount that you have ordered from amazon.com. Log into your amazon account and go to https://www.amazon.com/cpe/yourpayments/transactions. Open the chrome extension and click add button. Click next page and then click add. Repeat these steps as many times as necessary. If you want to start over click the reset button.
